content: this coat will fit any of my animal dolls to make sure of a good snug fit choose the same weight yarn and one needle size up from the size you knitted your animal doll in for example from a 2 75mm to a 3mm will also fit croc doll rabbit doll moley shrew kitten doll piglet mice yarn - this is a guide to what i used for my coat yarn a main colour tiny amount 4-ply weight in off-white i used drops alpaca shade 0100 off-white yarn b trim tiny amount faux fur yarn in off-white i used ricorumi furry furry in white knitting needles pair size 2 25mm/ us size 1 gauge 14 row x 10 stitches over 2 5cm/ 1in with 2 25mm/ us size 1 knitting needles and yarn a extras 2 x small safety pins or a circular knitting needle for holding stitches when not in use yarn sewing needle tiny buttons or beads
